html:
Dec 7 (Reuters) - DEVOTEAM SA DVTM.PA:

  • ENTERS A STRATEGIC COLLABORATION WITH AWS TO FOCUS ON ACCELERATING EMEA CUSTOMERS CLOUD ADOPTION

  • DEVOTEAM A CLOUD WILL HIRE 1500 CLOUD EXPERTS BY 2025

  • THIS 4-YEAR PROGRAM GIVES DEVOTEAM NEW AMBITIONS

  • THE AMBITION IS TO TRIPLE THE AMOUNT OF DEVOTEAM CUSTOMERS' CLOUD PROJECTS IMPLEMENTED OVER THE NEXT 4 YEARS

  • DEVOTEAM A CLOUD PLANS TO FIRST FOCUS ON FRANCE, GERMANY, UK, SWEDEN, PORTUGAL AND BELGIUM

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: DVTM.PA


(Gdansk Newsroom)
